section.name: Configuration
section.p:
Configuration parameters are mostly contained in astrogrid portal's web.xml file. If you are running Tomcat, the path will be:
[Tomcat directory]/webapps/astrogrid-portal/WEB-INF/web.xml

subsection.name: Setup Parameters
subsection.p:
All are contained in the web.xml file. The setup parameters come in three sets:
Registry Configuration.
Workflow Configuration
Email Configuration

subsection.name: Control Parameters
subsection.p:
All are contained in the web.xml file.
Session Timeout.
Download File Size Limitation.

subsection.name: Maintenance Parameters
subsection.p:
None are contained in the web.xml file.
Portal Outage Information.
Portal Redirection Information.

section.p: SUPPLY: Sample configuration file(s) where relevant - make sure these are adequately commented if supplied, and make clear where they need to be placed/edited within the installed webapp.
